summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Creator Registration system. Both public registration form and admin management features are fully functional with excellent user experience and proper backend integration.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - still correctly denies access, just different HTTP status code

minor_ui_issues.issue: Dropdown option selection has overlay interception in some cases

passed_tests: Public registration form loads at /register with all required fields
Form displays 12 platform options as clickable cards with icons
Platform selection works - multiple platforms can be selected
Niche dropdown displays 15 predefined options
Form validation works - submit button disabled when required fields empty
ARRIS intake question displays dynamic question text
Form submission creates new creator registration successfully
Success page shows registration ID and confirmation message
API endpoint GET /api/creators/form-options returns platforms, niches, ARRIS question
API endpoint POST /api/creators/register creates creator with status 'pending'
Duplicate email validation prevents multiple registrations
Missing field validation returns proper error responses
Admin login works with default credentials (admin@hivehq.com / admin123)
Admin creators page at /creators shows list of registrations
Creator statistics display correctly (total, pending, approved, active counts)
Admin can view creator details in modal with all registration information
Admin can approve creator registrations
Creator approval creates new user account in users collection
Creator status updates from 'pending' to 'active' after approval
API endpoint GET /api/creators returns list with proper authentication
API endpoint GET /api/creators/stats/summary returns registration statistics
API endpoint PATCH /api/creators/{id} updates creator status and creates user
Protected admin endpoints require authentication
Real-time statistics update after creator approval
